holidays.title: Be An Angel Day
holidays.description: We show you how to make a difference and become an angel on earth.

holidays.title: Folklore Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate Brazil's unique folk traditions on Folklore Day!

holidays.title: International Day Commemorating the Victims of Acts of Violence Based on Religion or Belief
holidays.description: Let’s work together for a peaceful world where religion guides and doesn’t divide.

holidays.title: National Bao Day
holidays.description: With countless possible fillings, you can be sure that there's a bao steamed to your liking!

holidays.title: National Burger Day
holidays.description: Join us as we bring you the best ways to celebrate National Burger Day.

holidays.title: National Pecan Torte Day
holidays.description: Prepare to spend an entire day eating one of the tastiest desserts ever!

holidays.title: National Surgical Oncologist Day
holidays.description: You never know when you may need a surgeon, so let's celebrate what they do.

holidays.title: National Take Your Cat to the Vet Day
holidays.description: We celebrate love for our friendly, furry, kitty companions.

holidays.title: Never Bean Better Day
holidays.description: Keep your friends close, your dogs closer, and celebrate the companionship of man’s best friend.

holidays.title: Rainbow Baby Day
holidays.description: Today is Rainbow Baby Day, and we join these beautiful infants in celebrating.

holidays.title: Russian Flag Day
holidays.description: Travel back in time and decode the symbolism behind Russia’s national flag.

holidays.title: World Plant Milk Day
holidays.description: Did you know plant milk is a good, sustainable, alternative to dairy milk?

holidays.title: Chuck Brown’s Birthday
holidays.description: Although he is no longer with us, Chuck Brown’s music still influences funk and hip-hop.

holidays.title: Claude Debussy’s Birthday
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate a composer ‘extraordinaire’ of the late 19th and early 20th Centuries.

holidays.title: Dua Lipa’s Birthday
holidays.description: With her deep and sultry voice, she is unquestionably a talented vocalist and an energetic performer.

holidays.title: Keith Powers’s Birthday
holidays.description: This excellent actor and model has a solid career and a promising future.

holidays.title: Kristen Wiig’s Birthday
holidays.description: This accomplished actress has achieved great things and shows no signs of slowing down anytime soon.

holidays.title: LaMelo Ball’s Birthday
holidays.description: LaMelo Ball is the best young player in the N.B.A. — and the face of its future.

holidays.title: Layne Staley’s Birthday
holidays.description: This gifted musician rose to prominence and is now regarded as a rock music legend.

holidays.title: Liane Valenzuela’s Birthday
holidays.description: The singer and actress has gained millions of fans who are increasing by the minute.

holidays.title: Morgan Adams’s Birthday
holidays.description: Her fun and quirky videos have made her successful on Instagram, with millions of views apiece.

holidays.title: Tori Amos’s Birthday
holidays.description: Singer, activist, environmentalist, and survivor. Amos carries these titles with pride, reflected in her music.

holidays.title: Yvie Oddly’s Birthday
holidays.description: This drag queen never stops challenging perceptions within and without the drag community
